articles.title: Maruti Suzuki logs highest ever sales of CNG cars at 1.57 lakh units in FY21 - Mint
articles.description: Maruti Suzuki India today said it has sold over 1.57 lakh CNG cars in FY21, its highest ever in a fiscal. The auto major had sold 1,06,444 CNG units in 2019-20
articles.content:

Maruti Suzuki India (MSI) on Wednesday said it has sold over 1.57 lakh CNG cars in FY21, its highest ever in a fiscal.The auto major had sold 1,06,444 CNG units in 2019-20.
